Name: Martinez (with London Dry gin)
Ingredients: 1 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: This Martinez is aromatic, complex and dry. Our previous recipe included dry vermouth to add balance and complexity: 60mml (20z) Drygin 15ml (½oz) Rosso (sweet vermouth 7.5ml (¼) Dry vermouth 5ml (1 barspoon) Maraschino liqueur 1 dah Aromatic bitters
History: London dry has been the dominant gin style for over 100 years, so by extension was the gin most frequently used to make a Martinez. See Martinez cocktail history
